import React from 'react' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../Rating' import products from '../../products_and_images/products' import Product from '../Product' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const {id} = useParams() const product = products.find(p=> p._id === id) return <> Go Back

{product.name}

 } export default ProductScreen
